alert.note: Alert for Central Oregon Coastal Strip; North Oregon Coast (Oregon) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Portland (Northwest Oregon and Southwest Washington)
info.headline: Red Flag Warning issued September 10 at 2:51PM PDT until September 10 at 8:00PM PDT by NWS Portland
info.description: ...CRITICAL FIRE WEATHER CONDITIONS CONTINUE INTO THIS EVENING... ...RED FLAG WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 8 PM PDT THIS EVENING FOR WIND AND LOW RELATIVE HUMIDITY WITH DRY AND UNSTABLE CONDITIONS FOR FIRE WEATHER ZONES 601, 612, AND 664... * AFFECTED AREA...In Oregon, Fire Weather Zone 601 North Oregon Coast and Fire Weather Zone 612 Central Oregon Coast. In Washington, Fire Weather Zone 664 South Washington Coast and West Willapa Hills. * WINDS..South winds 5 to 10 mph with gusts up to 25 mph along the coast. Away from the coast, east winds 10 to 15 mph with gusts to 25 mph diminishing late afternoon. * RELATIVE HUMIDITY...As low as 20 percent. * IMPACTS...Conditions may be favorable for rapid fire spread which may threaten life and property. Use extra caution with potential ignition sources, especially in grassy areas. Outdoor burning is not recommended.
info.instruction: A Red Flag Warning means that critical fire weather conditions are either occurring now, or will shortly. A combination of the above conditions can contribute to extreme fire behavior.

area.areaDesc: Central Oregon Coastal Strip; North Oregon Coast
